msbt.message: I, ya know, tried real hard to make this the perfect place to chill. Go ahead, have a look around.
<20_2 arg="10" />That is so comfy, <20_2 arg="9" />I could sleep in it all day.No worries, though! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />My tummy wakes me up, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I always watch cooking shows on this TV.One time, I saw something so yummy, I tried to lick the screen.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Don't, uh, don't do that. It didn't taste as good as it looked.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I always fall asleep when I listen to music on my .Even if I'm listening to "," or ""!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I start listening to my tunes, and munching away on my snacksand pretty soonI'm snoozing!That's why I don't know the words to any of K.K.'s songs, even though I listen to 'em all the time!
Didja know I<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> don't need ?My tummy ALWAYS knows what time it is!<10_4 /> SNACK TIME!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I've been watching my plant. It grows real quick, but I never see it.I think maybe <20_3 arg="6" />it's growing while I'm sleeping?

I take a bath after I eat because if I took a bath first <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />and spilled food on myself, I'd have to take another bath!Maybe I could just eat in the bathtub? Yeah Burger bubble bath!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, hey! Don't touch the !<10_4 /> <20_3 arg="6" />I spilled on it!
<20_2 arg="10" />This ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> Fits my buttperfectly.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My isn't just for decoration!<20_2 arg="6" /> Sometimes it's for making noise!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Can't imagine cooking without my !I can think about making any kinda food with this!Gurggleggurg<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Thinking about it doesn't make me less hungry, though
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's always good to keep that around in case I need to feel hungry.<20_2 arg="6" /> But I don't need it!My tummy just gets hungry all on its own!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! Inside of my house!<20_3 arg="6" />Oh man. Outdoor stuff? But indoors! Ohhhh maaaaan! It's supposed to be outside, but A HUH HUH HUH!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Before you ask about my , the answer is no.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm not scared of the dark. <10_4 />I just really, really, REALLY don't like it.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I spent two hours trying to clean my face yesterday. Turns out the mirror was just dirty. So now my face hurts.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I just love having my very own .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now when I spill on my clothes, I just stuff them in there forever, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />A huh huh. Isn't he just the cutest ever?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />He's actually the best roommate I've ever had. Hasn't been late with his rent check once, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I've actually got lots in common with my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />We both have eyes. We both live in this house. And get this! We both beg for food when we're hungry. I feel so lucky! It's like I found my long-lost brother, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Yep. It's the real deal, that there.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Apparently you can tell just by smelling the paint. I wonder if the same rule applies to tasting it Uh, probably not, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You noticed that ol' thing? I'm just kidding! I'm actually real proud of my . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I like it so much, I totally overlook the fact that it scares the bejammies out of me in the middle of the night.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Isn't it super cool that I have my own ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe it's not real art, but I don't care either way. Seeing it every day makes me smile, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />See my ?I don't think I could live without it. All you gotta do is turn it on, close your eyes, and Zzz
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Sometimes I can't help but stare at my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't want to make him feel weird, but I'm just so curious to know what he's thinking, .
